page.title: 01Village Life
page.content: Sometimes described as the forgotten villages of Northamptonshire, this is a largely unspoilt rural area. The low population numbers are likely to remain with only 'in-filling' building allowed. Agriculture & farming interests predominate{(3-7). Conservation & preservation of our heritage are major interests{(8-10)}; many houses are listed buildigs{(15)}. Increasingly people are choosing to live in the area{(16)}. diversifying community interests. There is a decline however in many services. No shops, poor transport & health care are increasing problems with an ageing population{(18)}. The natives are friendly & caring, actively participating in local events{(11-14)} Low unemployment{(17)}, little crime & the pleasant, peaceful surroundings making it an attractive place to live.
